Text:
Shiron's fame had spread throughout Oriana to the
point that there probably wasn't a soul in the land
who didn't know her name.

Her compositions are rich in unprecedented artistry
and innovation, and her polished performances have
bewitched large swaths of the populace.

They say the two fastest rising stars in the arts
world are Natsume in literature and Shiron in music.

Upon learning that the great Shiron had an
apprentice, a swarm of nobles descended
upon the hall in no time.

I spied them walking arm-in-arm just a moment ago...
The lout had his arm sandwiched between those
bountiful breasts...

What I wouldn't give to be in his place...the
insolent wretch. A woman of Shiron's caliber,
consorting with an undistinguished tramp...

No, she's still young, and bound to make a few
missteps along the way. All the more reason why
we must give her the guidance she needs...

Lady Shiron is unquestionably the foremost pianist in
the world. To think that she had a secret student...

It would be cruel to expect too much of the boy,
but this should make for an amusing diversion.
(The citizens are in turmoil,)

(yet the rich are living it up in the lap of
luxury...)
(I'll make sure they pay what's owed.)
The sound of piano music fills the hall.
"Moonlight Sonata", eh...
But the melody Cid plays is finely crafted.

It is as if each and every note has had all
extraneous elements pared away.

If a sound exists in his music, it is only because he
allows it.
*gasp*
Oh, my...!
Magnificent...!
Ahhh...!!!
Superb...

I can see it! Moonlight, shining down bright and
clear...!

The song ends, and Cid is showered in applause as
he rises from the bench.

(Hehehe, well? That's a master of Moonlight Sonata at
work. I can even play the whole thing on air piano.)
*sniff* I'm moved to tears!

Neither I nor anyone here will ever forget this
blissful moment where we basked in the true
essence of Moonlight Sonata!
(Epsilon has always been the ultimate hype girl.)
My young maestro, won't you tell us your name?
Uhhh, I'm...

He still has much to learn, but you will be the first
to know once his apprenticeship is complete.
(Hm?)
One of Perv's pockets has an odd bulge to it.
(A box. Could there be a ring inside...?)

Well, he has caught all of our eyes. I'm sure many
here would love to be his patron.
Oh, it's still much too early for that kind of talk.

He will take center stage at the proper place and
time.

And when he does...the entire world shall know his
name.
(Hehehe... No use trying to hide it.)
(I'll gladly make use of your precious money.)

Well, please put in a word with me whenever such a
time comes.

I would be happy to assist with procuring the proper
venue for the birth of a new legend.
You may also count on my aid.
And mine as well!

Despite their original setback, Cid was recognized as
Epsilon's student and shown to the castle's music
room.

(I keep looking for a moment to slip away, but it's
tough with a maid always hovering around.)

(It might raise questions if I just suddenly vanished
by moving at super speed, so... Aha!)
Lady Shiron.

While we're here, I was hoping I could check out more
of the castle.

Ah, "while we're here," yes. This might be a golden
opportunity.
Then allow me to act as your guide!
No, I can show myself aro

It would be unthinkable to leave Lady Shiron's prize
pupil unattended!
No, I can show mysel
I am Margaret, servant of the royal family.

I also have the honor of being Princess Rose's
personal maid, so I am very familiar with the
castle!
Rose's

This is your first visit to the castle, yes? In that
case, allow me to take you on a tour of its best
spots!
Whoa
Excuse me, but you need to back
Those are...
...Huh?
0% slime.
